name: Password Manager - Notion Template
description: The Ultimate Solution for Organising Your PasswordsKeeping track of your passwords can be a real headache. It's like trying to find a needle in a haystack every time you need to log in to an account. But worry no more!Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with having all your passwords neatly organised and readily available. No more mental clutter or forgotten passwords.Features:Advanced Password DatabasePassword Manager provides centralised database to store all your passwords in one place. No mor
features: Notion is an all-in-one workspace to store docs, databases, manage projects, company wikis and so much more.; If you don't have an account, don't worry.
